flawed_nl_solution:
The craft store made 36 / 3 = <<36/3=21>>21 sales in the fabric section.
It made 36 / 4 = <<36/4=9>>9 sales in the jewelry section.
Thus, there were 36 - 21 - 9 = <<36-21-9=6>>6 sales in the stationery section.
#### 6

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 21. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
